## MetaManager ls

List current or given directory (uses current context)

### Synopsis

When current context is gdrive, lists the current Drive directory or the given path. Use "context set <name>" to switch context.

```
MetaManager ls [path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ls
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
